summary: An Ordinance approving the assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 1387, for the improvement of Thirteenth Avenue South, from Grand Street to College Street; and certain parts of certain other streets and avenues therein named, all in the City of Seattle, by grading and curbing the same, under Ordinance No. 15117, and assessing the amounts thereof against each parcel and lot of land and part thereof shown in said roll, and providing for the collection thereof.
